sys_script_include.description: Sets a system property of this application.
sys_script_include.name: AppSetProperty

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_97e2bc811bb7bc50edf3642aab4bcbab
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_datasilosci.AppSetProperty</api_name><caller_access>1</caller_access><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Sets a system property of this application.</description><name>AppSetProperty</name><script><![CDATA[function AppSetProperty(strSuffix,vValue)
{
	var strName = 'x_snc_datasilosci.'+strSuffix;
	if (IsProperty(strName) == false)
	{
		return false;
	}
	gs.setProperty(strName,vValue);
	return true;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-11 15:43:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>97e2bc811bb7bc50edf3642aab4bcbab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AppSetProperty</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DataSilosCI WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_datasilosci">7a52f9f21bbef810edf3642aab4bcb8e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DataSilosCI WORK IN PROGRESS">7a52f9f21bbef810edf3642aab4bcb8e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_97e2bc811bb7bc50edf3642aab4bcbab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-11 15:43:48</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
